description: A windmill converts the wind energy into electrical energy.
heading: "Law of conservation of energy","Blades","Shaft","Gear box","Rotor","Tower","Generator","Windmill","Horizontal axis windmill","Vertical axis windmill"
head_description: "This law states that energy can be converted from one form to another, but it cannot be created or destroyed.","Aerodynamically shaped structures of windmills that capture wind's energy and convert it to rotational energy.","A long cylindrical device that extends from the center of the rotor along its axis.","The gear box increases the shaft speed.","An assembly of rotating blades that supplies lift or stability.","The tower holds the windmill up into the airflow.","Generates electricity using rotational energy of shaft.","A device that converts kinetic energy of the wind into mechanical energy to produce electricity.","A windmill in which the shaft is parallel to the ground, and the blades are perpendicular to the ground.","A windmill in which the shaft is perpendicular to the ground, and the blades are parallel to the ground."
